item.title: Citi downgrades Southwest to sell, says the airline's stock can fall 10%
item.description: Citi turned negative on Southwest shares amid concerns over valuation and earnings quality.

item.title: Seaport upgrades Netflix to buy ahead of earnings report
item.description: Seaport Research Partners joined the bull camp on Netflix ahead of the company's earnings report next week.

item.title: Hindenburg Research founder says he's closing short-seller research shop
item.description: Hindenburg took on companies including Nikola and Carvana and financial titan Carl Icahn as a short seller.
